resources.string: Name to be sent to new contacts:
Send text to new contact with your name.
This app allows you to perform 3 actions:
1. Add a contact from a recently received SMS message.
2. Add a contact from a traditional dialpad and send the new contact an SMS message including your name.
3. View your contacts in the order the were added (newest contact at the top).

Clicking the \"From SMS\" button on the main page will display a list of your most recent SMS messages with the most recent at the top. A message from a known contact will display that contact\'s name and the SMS message content. Messages from unknown numbers display the number followed by the message content.
Clicking on a message from an unkown number will add a contact whose name is the content of that SMS message.
Clicking the \"From Dialpad\" button allows you to add a contact by entering a name a number. The number will automatically be set as the contact\'s mobile number.

You also have the option to send the new contact a SMS message containing your name. If no name is set when you try to toggle this feature on, you will be asked to set your name. You can also set your name by clicking the menu button on your phone and then clicking \"Set Name\".
You can view your contacts list most recently added order by clicking the \"Recent Contacts\" button. Clicking a contact in the list will take you to that contacts page.
Add Contact was able to find your name on your phone. If it is correct, just hit Set Name. Otherwise, change it to whatever you want.
